name: Travel and Attractions
description: Popular destinations and off-the-beaten-path scenery from around the world, showcasing the culture and beauty of different regions, inspiring people to explore the world.

groups.name: World Famous Cities
groups.description: The famous buildings and cityscapes of international metropolises.

groups.name: Seaside Resorts
groups.description: Relaxing sanctuaries of beaches, sunshine, and waves.

groups.name: Mountain Tourism
groups.description: Hiking, sightseeing, and adventure in high mountains or hilly areas.

groups.name: Theme Parks
groups.description: Amusement facilities and the joyous world of fairy tales.

groups.name: Beaches and Islands
groups.description: Romantic beach resorts with clear water and swaying coconut trees.

groups.name: Around the World
groups.description: A collection of multi-country attractions, seeing the world without leaving home.

groups.name: Mountain Loop Road
groups.description: Endless scenic views for driving or cycling.

groups.name: Forest Cabins
groups.description: Quiet cabins away from the city, close to nature.

groups.name: Historical Sites
groups.description: Heritage-level buildings or sites deposited in the long river of history.

groups.name: World Heritage Sites
groups.description: Preserved areas with outstanding universal value and common cultural heritage.

groups.name: European Towns
groups.description: Quaint cobblestone streets and the artistic atmosphere of small towns.

groups.name: Asian Ancient Cities
groups.description: Ancient cities with rich ethnic cultures and a millennium of accumulation.

groups.name: African Savannah Adventure
groups.description: The shock of close contact with wild animals and the vast savannah.

groups.name: American Wilderness Road
groups.description: An adventurous journey through diverse terrains on a long road.

groups.name: Snow and Ice Travel
groups.description: The extreme cold test and magnificent scenery of the ice and snow world.

groups.name: Hot Air Balloon Scenery
groups.description: Viewing the earth's beautiful scenery and unique landforms from the air.

groups.name: Extreme Sports Tour
groups.description: Tour routes for high-stimulus activities like bungee jumping and paragliding.

groups.name: Folk Culture Festival
groups.description: Experience local festival activities and feel the charm of multiculturalism.

groups.name: Desert Adventure
groups.description: The magnificent desert spectacle of vast sand seas, camel caravans, and starry skies.

groups.name: Sea Cruise
groups.description: Cruising the sea on a luxury cruise, combining vacation and sightseeing.

groups.name: Photography Holy Land
groups.description: The source of inspiration for photography enthusiasts with excellent light and shadow.

groups.name: Road Trip
groups.description: The freedom and flexibility of road travel, experiencing the local scenery along the way.

groups.name: Hiking
groups.description: The deep walking of backpackers or hikers, getting close to nature and culture.

groups.name: Cycling Around the Lake
groups.description: Cycling along the lake shore, enjoying the lake and mountain scenery and fresh air.
